message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am prepared to consider offers. Given its significance and the fact that it is valued at $1,200,000 by you, I propose a negotiation starting point of $950,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between the intrinsic value and my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you would like to discuss further terms.
